title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the learning objectives, target audience, security considerations, desired features, ethical guidelines, and compliance with relevant laws and regulations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and security measures.

title: Develop Coding Challenges and Scenarios
description: Create a set of coding challenges and simulated scenarios that cover various ethical hacking techniques and concepts.

title: Implement Secure Environment
description: Set up a secure and isolated environment for running the coding challenges and scenarios.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for navigating the coding challenges, scenarios, and learning resources.

title: Implement User Management and Authentication
description: Develop a secure user management system with authentication and authorization mechanisms.

title: Create Learning Resources and Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive learning resources, tutorials, and documentation to support the coding challenges and scenarios.

title: Implement Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and implement quality assurance processes to ensure the security and reliability of the system.

title: Deploy and Maintain the System
description: Deploy the system to a production environment and establish processes for ongoing maintenance, updates, and security monitoring.
